issue.title: Image Solution runs with catkin setup but not using docker compose

content.raw:
One more thing. If this problem occurs only when you run your solution image within Docker-Compose, but it works fine when you run it as a standalone docker image; then can you also try to upload and run your solution image in [Cloudsim](https://subtchallenge.world/home)?

‌
content.html:
One more thing. If this problem occurs only when you run your solution image within Docker-Compose, but it works fine when you run it as a standalone docker image; then can you also try to upload and run your solution image in Cloudsim?
